title: Everything about Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Program
intro: So you are surfing through LinkedIn when suddenly you notice a phrase repeating across many profiles. Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador(MLSA) Program is a program to sponsor students majoring in disciplines related to technology. Under this program you get the opportunity to showcase your team building and leadership skills, which look…

title: Why you should have an online presence as a developer in 2023
intro: Being a developer is exciting. You made couple of projects, contributed to open-source, but what else. What else can you do with your time to be better. While every programmer has done most of the above mentioned activities, not all have a good online presence. …

title: Why you must have a portfolio site for yourself
intro: So you made a couple of really exciting projects, contributed to open-source, etc but how does one know all this about you. One won’t search for your username at all the places to map what you did. That’s what the portfolio site is for. …
